get.summary: Get all the data that's shown in the dashboard
get.description: Get all the statistics and the order of the rows in the dashboard. When a row is collapsed / hidden by default, the data for the hidden row isn't sent.

200.description: User is allowed to see the statistics of the requested user.

dashboardRows.description: An array containing JSON objects of the dashboard rows. The order of the objects is the order of the rows.

lastPlays.description: An array containing JSON objects of the last played movies based on date.

mostWatchedActors.description: An array containing JSON objects of the most watched male actors.

mostWatchedActresses.description: An array containing JSON objects of the most watched actresses.

mostWatchedDirectors.description: An array containing JSON objects of the most watched directors.

mostWatchedLanguages.description: An array containing JSON objects of the most watched languages.

mostWatchedGenres.description: An array containing JSON objects of the most watched genres.

mostWatchedProductionCompanies.description: An array containing JSON objects of the most watched production companies, the watched movies they produced and their country of origin.

mostWatchedReleaseYears.description: An array containing JSON objects of the most watched release years.

watchlistItems.description: An array containing JSON objects of the items in the watchlist.

get.description: Gets the last plays for use in lazy-loading the data shown in the user's dashboard

404.description: The requested user does not exist.

get.description: Gets the most watched actors for use in lazy-loading the data shown in the user's dashboard

404.description: The requested user does not exist.

get.description: Gets the most watched actresses for use in lazy-loading the data shown in the user's dashboard

404.description: The requested user does not exist.

get.description: Gets the most watched directors for use in lazy-loading the data shown in the user's dashboard

404.description: The requested user does not exist.

get.description: Get list of the languages that have been watched the most, together with the amount of times they have been watched.

404.description: The requested user does not exist.

get.description: Get list of the genres that have been watched the most, together with the amount of times they have been watched.

404.description: The requested user does not exist.

get.description: Get list of the production companies that have been watched the most, together with the amount of times they have been watched, the watched movies they've produced and their country of origin.

404.description: The requested user does not exist.

get.description: Get list of the release years that have been watched the most, together with the amount of times they have been watched.

404.description: The requested user does not exist.

get.description: Get all the movies in the watchlist of the user.

404.description: The requested user does not exist.

get.summary: Get played movies with watch dates of user
get.description: Get all played movies with watch dates set. Sorted by most recently watch dates on default.

post.summary: Add movie play with watch date set to user
post.description: Create or update the provided watch dates for the specified movies. A date for plays is required.

put.summary: Replace movie play with watch date set for user
put.description: Create or replace the provided watch dates for the specified movies. A date for plays is required.

delete.summary: Delete movie watch dates from user history
delete.description: Delete all watch dates of specified movies if no specific watch dates are provided. A date for plays is required.

get.summary: Get movies in watchlist of user
get.description: Get all movies on the user watchlist. Sorted by most recently added on default.

post.summary: Add movie to watchlist of user

delete.summary: Delete movie from watchlist of user

get.description: Get all played movies and their watch dates.

post.description: Create or update the provided watch dates for the specified movies.

put.description: Create or replace the provided watch dates for the specified movies.

delete.description: Delete all watch dates of specified movies if no specific watch dates are provided.

get.description: Search remotely on tmdb for the movie with the specified search filters. Movies already existing locally will have a Movary id set.

post.description: Endpoint to scrobble your Plex watches to Movary.

parameters.name: UUID
parameters.description: An UUID that is generated by the user in the Plex settings.

post.description: Endpoint to scrobble your Jellyfin watches to Movary.

parameters.name: UUID
parameters.description: An UUID that is generated by the user in the Jellyfin settings.

post.description: Endpoint to scrobble your Emby watches to Movary.

parameters.name: UUID
parameters.description: An UUID that is generated by the user in the Emby settings.

post.summary: Update the rating of an user for a movie
post.description: Update the rating of an user for a movie

rating.description: Rating of the movie. It has to be an integer in the range of 0 - 10. If the rating is 0, then the rating will be deleted.

get.description: Get the movie rating from the current user. The movie is found by using the TMDB ID

parameters.name: tmdbId
parameters.description: The ID of the movie from TMDB

200.description: The TMDB ID was valid and the ratings have been returned.

personalRating.description: The rating of the movie by the user. It will be null if there is no rating.

get.description: Get information about the authenticated user.

isAdmin.description: True if user is an admin, false if not.

post.description: Create an authentication token via email, password and optionally TOTP code. Add the token as X-Movary-Token header to further requests. Token lifetime 1d default, 30d with rememberMe.

requestBody.description: The credentials and optionally a two-factor authentication code

authToken.description: The authentication token to be used in future requests.

userId.description: The ID of the authenticated user

isAdmin.description: True if the user is an admin, False if the user isn't.

delete.description: Delete the authentication token provided in the X-Movary-Token header value.

204.description: Returned if authentication token does no longer exist

id.description: The ID Movary has assigned this person

gender.description: Can be either f (for female) or m (for male)

tmdb_poster_path.description: The filepath of the poster from the TMDB API

poster_path.description: The filepath of the poster on the local Kovary installation from the root directory of Movary

id.description: The ID Movary has assigned this person

gender.description: Can be either f (for female) or m (for male)

tmdb_poster_path.description: The filepath of the poster from the TMDB API

poster_path.description: The filepath of the poster on the local Kovary installation from the root directory of Movary

count.description: The amount of watched movies this production company has released

origin_country.description: The country where this production company was founded

movies.description: The list of watched movies this production company has released

count.description: The amount of times watched movies have occured in this language

name.description: The name of the language in speaking format

count.description: The amount of times watched movies contain this genre
The amount of times watched movies have been released in this year

204.description: Successful operation, response has no content

400.description: The request payload or header are not correct

401.description: The provided credentials or TOTP code are not valid
